Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Cristoforo Colombo in Rome (EUR), you'll be minutes from Euroma2 and close to Museum of Roman Civilization. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of PalaLottomatica and White Gallery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 205 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Rome? This hotel has facilities measuring 1292 square feet (120 square meters), including meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Cristoforo Colombo in Rome (EUR), you'll be minutes from Euroma2 and close to Museum of Roman Civilization. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of PalaLottomatica and White Gallery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Euroma2 - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
PalaLottomatica - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
White Gallery - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Museum of Roman Civilization - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Museo Nazionale delle Arti e Tradizioni Popolari - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Palazzo dei Congressi - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Palazzo della Civilta Italiana - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Abbazia delle Tre Fontane - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
I Granai Shopping Center - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Parco de' Medici Golf Club - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Basilica of St. Paul Outside the Walls - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Roma Tre University - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Biomedical Campus Rome - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Montemartini Museum - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Catacombs of St. Domitilla - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 17.6 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for Cristoforo Colombo is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Cristoforo Colombo are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi

The preferred airport for Cristoforo Colombo is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
